column5: I've been reading about all the flooding and reviewed the flooding maps provided by the province. Did anyone fish the Ogoki last week and want to post river conditions? Thanks
The waboose dam has been opened so the river below the dam is extremely high. Not sure how it looks above
Waboose dam is that the dam on Ogoki Reservoir? Thanks Charlie
yes the big dam on the east end of the reservoir, I think the one below mojikit is called summit dam
Could be lots of trees floating around in that tree infested waters.
Can you imagine what the fishing is like at Eight Flume Falls right now? That would be incredible!
Im heading to ogoki reservoir in 14 days...but whose counting.,.,
My favorite lake! Pick up some dinner at Scorpion Point! Some of the best times I've had on the water have been at Ogoki. Enjoy the trip!
We leave for Kayedon in 6 days, fly in in 8 days. Thank you for the replies
